author: zhuangzi
quotes: Listening stops with the ears, the mind stops with recognition, but spirit is empty and waits on all things.
We cling to our own point of view, as though everything depended on it. Yet our opinions have no permanence; like autumn and winter, they gradually pass away.
The sage embraces things. Ordinary men discriminate amongst them and parade their discriminations before others. So I say; those who discriminate, fail to see.
To examine oneself makes good use of sight.
You can't discuss the ocean with a well frog - he's limited by the space he lives in. You can't discuss ice with a summer insect - he's bound to a single season.
Great wisdom is generous; petty wisdom is contentious. Great speech is impassioned, small speech cantankerous.
Take care of your body, then the rest will automatically become stronger.
Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.
Eyes that are blind have no way to tell the loveliness of faces and features; eyes with no pupils have no way to tell the beauty of colored and embroidered silks.
The petty thief is imprisoned but the big thief becomes a feudal lord.
Forget the years, forget distinction. Leap into the boundless and make it your home.

Men cannot see their reflection in running water, / but only in still water. Only that which is itself still / can still the seekers of stillness . . . If water derives / lucidity from stillness, how much more the / faculties of the mind! The mind of the sage, being / in repose, becomes the mirror of the universe.
Human life is limited, but knowledge is limitless. To drive the limited in pursuit of the limitless is fatal; and to presume that one really knows is fatal indeed!
Cherish that which is within you, and shut off what which is without; for much knowledge is a curse.
Men of this world all rejoice in others being like themselves, and object to others not being like themselves.
A frog in a well cannot conceive of the ocean.
Great wisdom is generous; petty wisdom is contentious.
Good fortune is as light as a feather, but nobody knows how to pick it up. Misfortune is as heavy as earth, but nobody knows how to stay out of it's way.
Easy is right. Begin right and you are easy. Continue easy and you are right. The right way to go easy is to forget the right way, and forget that the going is easy.
Good order results spontaneously when things are let alone.
I know the joy of fishes in the river through my own joy, as I go walking along the same river.
Those who seek to satisfy the mind of man by hampering it with ceremonies and music and affecting charity and devotion have lost their original nature.
Only he who has no use for the empire is fit to be entrusted with it.

Those that think that wealth is the proper thing for them cannot give up their revenues; those that seek distinction cannot give up the thought of fame; those that cleave to power cannot give the handle of it to others. While they hold their grasp of those things, they are afraid of losing them. When they let them go, they are grieved and they will not look at a single example, from which they might perceive the folly of their restless pursuits - such men are under the doom of heaven.
Forget the years, forget distinctions. Leap into the boundless and make it your home.
We cling to our own point of view, as though everything depended on it. Yet our opinions have no permanence; like autumn and winter, they gradually pass away.
A sage steers by the bright light of confusion and doubt.
You cannot speak of ocean to a well-frog, the creature of a narrower sphere. You cannot speak of ice to a summer insect, the creature of a season.

author: ziad-k.-abdelnour
quotes: Power doesn't always roar...The art of exerting power is an art used in doses - the more hidden it is the more effective.
Don't roll the dice if you can't pay the price.
No one is fearless. The difference between achievers and everyone else is that they take action despite their fears.
Always remember... Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
Achievers move forward at all times. Achievement is not a plateau, it's a beginning.
Be a reflection of what you'd like to see in others. You get in return what you give.
When life gives you lemons, order the lobster tail.
Always remember the stronger your position in life, the more enemies you're gonna have, while friends come and go.
The odds will always favor the man with a plan.
Every successful venture is based on an unoriginal idea, beautifully executed.
People are not who they say but rather who their actions reveal them to be. Be smart about it.
Excuses are useless. Results are priceless.
The trouble with school is they give you the answer, then they give you the exam. That's not life....
Everyone you meet comes with baggage, find someone who cares enough to help you unpack.
Don't turn around. Don't look back. Keep moving forward. Keep pushing. The pot of gold is at the end of the rainbow, not the beginning
Life is like a camera. Focus on what's important. Capture the good times. And if things don't work out, just take another shot.
Be careful who you trust, the devil was once an angel.
How you gather, manage and use intel in life determines whether you win or lose. That's the # 1 rule for the mavericks in business.
Never let success get to your head and never let failure get to your heart.
Have the backbone to go after what you want in life. It's too easy to settle.
We're taught by repetition but great innovators need to be great at doing the different.
You need to be loyal to the people who have helped you in the past & gave you a break when you were not a big player.
A negative mind will never give a positive life.
Seek respect, not attention. It lasts longer.
Fake people talk about other people being fake. Real people worry about their business, and no one else's.
If you make a hiring mistake, make the change quickly. Don't ignore problems. Don't assume it will get better.
Don't be scared to be intelligent. Knowledge is sexy and powerful.
Always remember, rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
